author: Thomas Carper
text: For me, our beaches have always been a source of personal inspiration.

author: Pablo Picasso
text: Inspiration exists, but it has to find us working.

author: Jenny Nimmo
text: Inspiration comes from the world around me. I'm an inveterate eavesdropper.

author: Cecilia Dart-Thornton
text: Periodically, I return to the classics for inspiration and refreshment.

author: Edward Ruscha
text: I travel a lot, but I don't come away with new inspiration.

author: Bob Dylan
text: Inspiration is hard to come by. You have to take it where you find it.

author: Larry Niven
text: In general, I don't know when inspiration will pop up.

author: Lukas Foss
text: In the nineteenth century the more grandiose word inspiration began to replace the word idea in the arts.

author: Rob Morrow
text: I'd like to think that the notion of inspiration will transcend cultural things that are going on. There's something classic about this movie that I'm hoping reaches kids.

author: Leon Uris
text: I have drawn inspiration from the Marine Corps, the Jewish struggle in Palestine and Israel, and the Irish.

author: Bil Keane
text: In Roslyn, Pennsylvania, we started our real-life family circus. They provided the inspiration for my cartoons. I provided the perspiration.

author: Grant-Lee Phillips
text: I think a lot of songwriters would agree that it's often easier to find inspiration in misery.

author: Eric Church
text: Bob Seger was a huge inspiration.

author: Amelia Atwater-Rhodes
text: In 2006, when I had come very close to calling my agent and telling him I needed to take a break, NaNoWriMo was where I found my inspiration again.

author: Jim Davis
text: I probably get more inspiration for human stories and idiosyncrasies than I do animal stories.

author: Ray Bradbury
text: It's lack that gives us inspiration. It's not fullness.

author: Jill Scott
text: I don't write on demand - I wait for inspiration to come.

author: Stephen Gardiner
text: The exterior cannot do without the interior since it is from this, as from life, that it derives much of its inspiration and character.

author: Tove Lo
text: I was big into grunge, like Nirvana and Hole, when I was younger, which has been a really huge inspiration because of its rawness and honesty.

author: Scott Turow
text: I don't like re-writing very much. The fourth and the fifth draft - that's too much like work. There's not much inspiration about it, and the lawyerly side kicks in - being very careful and somewhat technical.

author: Jeffrey Katzenberg
text: Inspiration comes from all different places.

author: Grant Morrison
text: I guess my inspiration is this - I like to pretend that every story that ever happened to 'Batman' was real and is part of this one guy's life.

author: Tullian Tchividjian
text: There is a strange impulse in many to protect Bible characters and to use them as inspiration... as if sanctification happens as a result of emulation.

author: David A. Bednar
text: Revelations are conveyed in a variety of ways, including, for example, dreams, visions, conversations with heavenly messengers, and inspiration. Some revelations are received immediately and intensely; some are recognized gradually and subtly.

author: M. Ward
text: I get most of my inspiration from older records and older production styles, and that ends up rearing its head in the records that I make.

author: Josh Homme
text: Any band on their first couple records is just trying to keep up with their inspiration.

author: Chris Brown
text: I drew a lot of inspiration from the Ginuwines, the Ushers, the Michael Jacksons, the James Browns, Sam Cooke.

author: James Larkin
text: We are now on the threshold of a newer movement, with a newer hope and a new inspiration.

author: Terrance Hayes
text: I value teaching. It's one of the places I get inspiration, engagement.

author: Ezra Koenig
text: I still to this day get the most inspiration from rap lyrics.

author: Vincent Van Gogh
text: Do not quench your inspiration and your imagination; do not become the slave of your model.

author: Thomas A. Edison
text: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.

author: Trevor Rabin
text: One of the things I try to be very careful of is not taking a movie when I know I have no inspiration left.

author: Brandon Stanton
text: 'Humans of New York' did not result from a flash on inspiration. It grew from five years of experimenting, tinkering, and messing up.

author: Manolo Blahnik
text: A lot of things trigger my inspiration. It can be the most banal things.

author: Kelly Rutherford
text: I get I style inspiration everywhere: the streets of New York, magazines... everywhere!

author: Sylvester Stallone
text: Jesus is the inspiration for anyone to go the distance.

author: Peter Facinelli
text: When I was younger I saw a movie called 'Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid' with Paul Newman and Robert Redford. Those two actors and that movie was my inspiration to want to be an actor.

author: Joe Grant
text: What is he? He's a puppeteer and he's got a lot of inspiration all around him, and the fact that they can manipulate the expressions now with ease compared to what it used to be.

author: Quentin Blake
text: Inspiration is some mysterious blessing which happens when the wheels are turning smoothly.

author: Adrian Tomine
text: All my stories take place on the West Coast - not the beach, but smaller inland towns. I feel homesick, and I find inspiration in capturing that.

author: Tom Wilkinson
text: If the script is telling the story well, that is your inspiration, and you do not need to go somewhere else.

author: Shelly-Ann Fraser-Pryce
text: It's Jamaican women and children who are my inspiration.

author: Rudolf Nureyev
text: Technique is what you fall back on when you run out of inspiration.

author: Nolan Bushnell
text: The ultimate inspiration is the deadline.

author: Eddie Floyd
text: The groups, though, were my inspiration way back then. I liked Frankie Lyman and the Teenagers.

author: Cole Porter
text: My sole inspiration is a telephone call from a director.

author: Willem Dafoe
text: Action breeds inspiration more than inspiration breeds action.

author: Benjamin Cardozo
text: Method is much, technique is much, but inspiration is even more.

author: Harmony Korine
text: I'm not a video brat. I don't derive all my inspiration through movies. I get it from a lot of other places, too.

author: Sara Bareilles
text: I'm of the ilk of writers that feels you have to be open to the inspiration.

author: Jude Law
text: Personally speaking there's only so long you can go from film to film to film. There's an inspiration an actor gets from the stage.

author: Colleen Atwood
text: I'd seen the current stage production and the 1975 production of Chicago. I liked them both very much, but I didn't use them necessarily as inspiration.

author: Cathy Marie Buchanan
text: I don't wait for inspiration. I get up and write every day.

author: Nita Ambani
text: Sachin has been an integral part of Mumbai Indians and a source of inspiration for the team ever since the inception.

author: Graeme Murphy
text: I look at the dancers and I get the inspiration for the work from them.

author: Gene Luen Yang
text: Writing, for me, is very inspiration-dependent. And inspiration can be a jerk.

author: Beck
text: You have to shelve a lot of your inspiration. There's only so much you can do with one record.

author: Kevin Corrigan
text: Inspiration can come from anywhere. But I do love actors. I wish I could drop a bunch of names, but there are just too many.

author: Mahesh Babu
text: My father is my inspiration.

author: Nik Wallenda
text: My great-grandfather, Karl Wallenda, was my biggest hero in life, my biggest inspiration behind everything I do.

author: Lactantius
text: The prophets, who were very many, proclaim and declare the one God; for, being filled with the inspiration of the one God, they predicted things to come, with agreeing and harmonious voice.

author: Nicola Formichetti
text: Japan, for me, will always be my inspiration source.

author: James Rollins
text: I don't actually have a one wellspring of inspiration. Though I'm most often inspired while reading - both fiction and nonfiction.

author: Chuck Close
text: I don't work with inspiration. Inspiration is for amateurs. I just get to work.

author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
text: No one was ever great without some portion of divine inspiration.

author: Alicia Silverstone
text: I'm always looking for inspiration.

author: Shelby Foote
text: Most of my inspiration, if that's the word, came from books themselves.

author: Jon Stewart
text: Insomnia is my greatest inspiration.

author: John Varvatos
text: A part of my kind of design and inspiration ethos is that I carry around a leather notebook and I sketch in it, doodle in it, write notes in it, and I put pictures in it.

author: Riz Ahmed
text: I go to a lot of stand-up comedy. I find more inspiration from observational stuff than from rap.

author: Robin Gibb
text: Everyone's looking to the urban scene for inspiration now.

author: Vikram Seth
text: You get your inspiration - suggestions - wherever you have to, even from your mother.

author: Octavio Paz
text: Wit invents; inspiration reveals. The inventions of wit are conceits - metaphors and paradoxes - that discover the secret correspondences that unite beings and things among and with themselves; inspiration is condemned to dissipate its revelations - unless a form can be found to contain them.

author: Harry Kane
text: Tom Brady is a big inspiration and a big idol of mine.

author: Paul Dano
text: The idea of writer's block or not having inspiration is totally terrifying to me.

author: Jeffrey Zeldman
text: When we launched The Deck, I hoped other networks would take inspiration from it and figure out how to increase engagement while minimizing clutter. I even tried to sell my studio's media clients on the notion of fewer, better-priced, better-targeted ads.

author: Vikram Seth
text: The thing about inspiration is that it takes your mind off everything else.

author: Jean Anouilh
text: Inspiration is a farce that poets have invented to give themselves importance.

author: Ina Garten
text: I use other cookbooks for inspiration. I must say I tend to cook from my own cookbooks for parties.

author: Winston Churchill
text: I always seem to get inspiration and renewed vitality by contact with this great novel land of yours which sticks up out of the Atlantic.

author: DJ Khaled
text: I'm honored that everybody's inspired off my inspiration.

author: John Lydon
text: My inspiration is everything that the human being gets up to.

author: Kate Christensen
text: The male muse is an unaccountably rare thing in art. Where does that leave female artists looking for inspiration?

author: Jorma Taccone
text: I'm a little younger than these guys, but I would say all of us are huge fans of the original 'MacGyver' series, and obviously we found that inspiration for the original pitch for 'MacGruber.'

author: Rosie O'Donnell
text: I think Oprah who is the height of aspiration and inspiration recognizes something in me that is germane.

author: Connie Sellecca
text: This was all the inspiration it took: We put 100 percent of ourselves in the lines. We personally take care of everything, from fulfillment to answering the mail.

author: Charles Ives
text: Every great inspiration is but an experiment - though every experiment we know, is not a great inspiration.

author: Colson Whitehead
text: You can't rush inspiration.

author: Anil Kapoor
text: Not exactly but I get inspiration from stories which are unconventional.

author: M. F. Husain
text: All this talk about inspiration and moment is nonsense.

author: William Henry Moody
text: The very air in which you live is an inspiration.

author: Dimebag Darrell
text: I was mostly influenced by bands like Black Sabbath and Judas Priest - Metallica's 'Kill 'Em All' was also a hell of an inspiration.

author: Nick Cave
text: 'Inspiration' is a word used by people who aren't really doing anything.

author: John Updike
text: Inspiration arrives as a packet of material to be delivered.

author: Henry David Thoreau
text: Our moments of inspiration are not lost though we have no particular poem to show for them; for those experiences have left an indelible impression, and we are ever and anon reminded of them.

author: Concha Buika
text: I find inspiration in everything.

author: John Mahoney
text: I believe in divine inspiration and things like that and I really relish a good, attentive, participating audience.

author: Colin Greenwood
text: Motion Picture Soundtrack on Kid A was another Coltrane inspiration.

author: Nomar Garciaparra
text: My inspiration was the game itself, not any individual player in it.

author: Alicia Keys
text: It's not until I hear songs that I've done, that I realize how much of an inspiration music from the '60s and '70s has been.

author: Carolina Herrera
text: I don't get my inspiration from books or a painting. I get it from the women I meet.

author: Thomas A. Edison
text: His genius he was quite content in one brief sentence to define; Of inspiration one percent, of perspiration, ninety nine.

author: Birch Bayh
text: Certainly I think the election of John Kennedy and all he stood for was one that really was an inspiration.

author: Adrianne Palicki
text: Angelina Jolie is my style inspiration.

author: Richelle Mead
text: There are little gems all around us that can hold glimmers of inspiration.

author: John Ortberg
text: I need an inspiration that is grounded in reality while thoroughly transcendent.

author: Van Morrison
text: When I started studying tenor saxophone as a kid in Belfast, I did so with a guy named George Cassidy, who was also a big inspiration.

author: M. Ward
text: I'm somebody who gets a lot of inspiration from dreams.

author: Giacomo Puccini
text: Inspiration is an awakening, a quickening of all man's faculties, and it is manifested in all high artistic achievements.

author: Kailash Kher
text: My inspiration comes from the common man and nature.

author: Waris Ahluwalia
text: My friends are a huge part of my inspiration.

author: Bill Skarsgard
text: To me, it's all about inspiration. What gets me creatively excited is a challenge.

author: Monica Johnson
text: Writers do draw inspiration from their own lives, which, quite frankly, might be more interesting than fiction.

author: Richard Dawkins
text: Beauty arises out of human inspiration.

author: Arthur Middleton
text: Times have changed since George Herbert... but the principle and spirit in which he ministered as a priest remains an inspiration and model for all priests.

author: Mickalene Thomas
text: What you put on your wall should be inspiration.

author: Waris Ahluwalia
text: My inspiration is love and history.

author: Wislawa Szymborska
text: Though I may deny poets their monopoly on inspiration, I still place them in a select group of Fortune's darlings.

author: Cory Booker
text: Let's not judge. Let's draw inspiration from each other's stories - successes and failures - and realize we're all connected.

author: George Packer
text: In its lowest, most common form, inspiration is simple charisma that becomes magnified by the media, as with Ronald Reagan or Bill Clinton.

author: Kapil Dev
text: There is inspiration all around us.

author: Flume
text: I actually found not having a routine was inspiration.

author: Gillian Jacobs
text: Inspiration strikes at very funny times.

author: Taio Cruz
text: Babyface is definitely a big inspiration.

author: Kristi Yamaguchi
text: The past couple years training with Kurt have really brought inspiration into my skating.

author: Jimmy Chamberlin
text: My brother was always in bands and on the road when I was a kid and he was my inspiration. He never made it with a big band, in fact he never made a record. Here he is fifty-something years old.

author: John Scofield
text: I find as much inspiration from the forerunners of jazz as I do the modern-day innovators of jazz.

author: Brendan Iribe
text: The University of Maryland was an inspiration for me, and the relationships I made there have lasted a lifetime.

author: Sabrina Carpenter
text: My first inspiration for acting came from the first episode of 'Hannah Montana.' That's when I knew I wanted to be a singer and an actress.

author: Olivia Wilde
text: Inspiration is the key to everything.

author: Vonda Shepard
text: The last thing I wanted was a big paycheck but no inspiration or support.

author: Santigold
text: I pick up inspiration from everywhere and it all manages to keep stored in my brain somewhere.

author: Lynn Schusterman
text: Just as we rely on Israel as a continual source of inspiration and renewal, Israel relies on us.

author: John Philip Sousa
text: Any composer who is gloriously conscious that he is a composer must believe that he receives his inspiration from a source higher than himself.

author: Melanie Rawn
text: If I had any real idea of exactly where inspiration comes from, I'd go there, find the foolish thing, bottle it, sell it, and retire to Tuscany.

author: Kriti Sanon
text: I have no particular inspiration, but I do find Anushka Sharma, Deepika Padukone and Kangana Ranaut amazing.

author: P. L. Travers
text: I cannot summon up inspiration; I myself am summoned.

author: Picabo Street
text: I get my inspiration from everyone when I need it and how I need it.

author: Robert Englund
text: I always get inspiration from whatever characters say about my character.

author: Ella Henderson
text: When I am having my picture taken, I channel Beyonce. In the studio, my inspiration is Adele.

author: Bjork
text: There is such a big chunk of me that is David Attenborough. I think he is my biggest inspiration.

author: Charlotte Dujardin
text: People tell me I'm their idol and a huge inspiration - that's really surreal.

author: Mahmoud Darwish
text: To be under occupation, to be under siege, is not a good inspiration for poetry.

author: Georg Brandes
text: But I did not find any positive inspiration in my studies until I approached my nineteenth year.

author: Bill Viola
text: I spend a lot of time writing. I get inspiration from texts rather than images.

author: Janet Jackson
text: I believe in a higher power. I believe in inspiration.

author: Marina Abramovic
text: All my inspiration comes from life. That's how it never stops, in a way.

author: Madeleine L'Engle
text: Inspiration usually comes during work, rather than before it.
